page.title: 15EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content: On Saturday we went to the fete and me and Mrs Wheeler talked to a policeman and I said is the Police Station still being used and he said yes but it is only being used as an office.Outside the station door it has an emergency telephone that connects immediately to Uttoxeter Police Station. The policeman in his van has to look after several villages. A fireman came to talk to us about his job. He had been a fireman 14 years. At Abbots Bromley they have nine retained men altogether. They have to live within 1 mile of the village. They have 1 fire engine. There are about 5O fires during 1 year. The fire engine is 8 yrs. old. They clean the engine as soon as they have put out a fire. In an emergency ambulances come from Uttoxeter. Our nearest hospital is in Burton-on-Trent.
